Package org.training.foodorderapplication.config

package org.training.foodorderapplication.config
This package contains configuration classes for the Food Order Application. The classes ensure that the application is secure and adheres to best practices for authentication and authorization.

The package contains the following classes:

JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint - handles unauthorized requests

JwtAuthenticationFilter - filters incoming requests and authenticates the user using JWT tokens

JwtTokenUtil - provides utility methods for working with JWT tokens

OpenAPI30Configuration - provides configuration for the OpenAPI 3.0 specification

SecurityConfig - provides security configuration for the application, including setting up authentication and authorization rules.

By using JWT tokens and OpenAPI 3.0, the application is able to provide a secure and efficient experience for both customers and restaurant staff.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.training.foodorderapplication
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
    A class that implements the AuthenticationEntryPoint interface.
    JwtAuthenticationFilter
    JwtAuthenticationFilter extends OncePerRequestFilter class to intercept each incoming request to check for JWT token in the header.
    JwtTokenUtil
    A utility class for generating and validating JWT tokens.
    OpenAPI30Configuration
    This class provides configuration for OpenAPI 3.0 integration with Spring Boot applications.
    SecurityConfig
    The SecurityConfig class provides the security configuration for the application.
